ygData.msgSnippet: I think an RTS is a Real Time Screwdriver...but I m not sure.  Paralto of Povar ... From: Bob Stewart [mailto:dreambard@bigplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, July
ygData.messageBody:
I think an RTS is a Real Time Screwdriver...but I'm not sure. <g>

Paralto of Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart [mailto:dreambard@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 6:13 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Secret Code


From: Bob Stewart <dreambard@...>

At 02:53 PM 7/22/99 -0700, Sean Kennedy wrote:
>I have to agree with you here. With my bard, I picked up a RTS

Could we please limit (or eliminate) the use of acronyms at least here on
the mailing list? They're secret code to those who aren't experienced in
the particular area.

They are a growing scourge in the game in general.

Bob
